name: Shady Part of Me
description:
Shady Part of Me is a puzzle game, where gameplay serves narration.
The player will be invited to play two little girls.
One is the shadow of the other.
Along convoluted scenes, story twists and surprising memos, their story takes place. They evolve. They try to cooperate and reach their common goal : freedom.
Shady Part Of Me is a solo game.
There are Two Girls but One Character.
And therefore One Player.
Key Features
Switch from 2D to 3D at will
Play with light, shadows and perspective to overcome obstacles
Art rendering in watercolor like style
The puzzle is your mind and you have to break the dream.
Live the drawn narrative journey of your character
Evolve in a world where light and shadow really follow the laws of physics
